slide_one.title: About company
slide_one.descr: The Uzbek-British joint venture «Samarkand Garden Plast» LLC was established in 2013 in the Bulungur district of the Samarkand region of the Republic of Uzbekistan. JV LLC «Samarkand Garden Plast» is one of the largest agricultural holdings that specializes in growing, processing, canning, freezing and storage of fruits and vegetables in the Republic of Uzbekistan. The company employs 300 people, and we usually increase the number of employees to 1000 during the active harvest period.

slide_two.title: Intensive Gardens
slide_two.descr: The total area of orchards is ~ 2000 ha. The area of finished orchards is ~ 970 ha. Drip irrigation throughout the gardens. Peach, cherry and cherry. Commercial varieties of fruit trees from Italy and Greece. Virus-free rootstock - seedlings are resistant to viral diseases

slide_three.title: «EAST AGRO INTERNATIONAL» LLC
slide_three.descr: One of the leading activities of our agricultural holding is the production of canned products on the basis of the production enterprise «EAST AGRO INTERNATIONAL» LLC (Shakhrisabz). The production capacity of our company is about 8 million cans per season. We produce canned products in cans and glass jars: peach halves in syrup, gherkins, tomatoes, mixes of gherkins and tomatoes (cherries), as well as jam mixtures, compotes, apple, peach and apricot puree, tomato paste.
